products.name: Allsaints Mode Merino Zip Hoodie
products.brandedName: AllSaints Mode Merino Zip Hoodie
products.description: About The Brand AllSaints collections of womenswear, menswear, and accessories both serve and represent a global community of customers. Founded in 1994 by husband-and-wife fashion design duo Kait Bolongaro and Stuart Trevor, the brand's name acknowledges the All Saints Road in Notting Hill and is still headquartered in London today. At the core of the collections is the concept of reliable, go-to outfitting customers can create for themselves without lacking uniqueness-a uniform without uniformity. Sourcing raw materials and reducing water usage, memberships with Better Cotton Initiative and Responsible Wool Standard, as well as Sedex and the British Leather Confederation, AllSaints is committed to ethical production throughout the manufacturing process. This dedication to responsibility also encompasses the company's culture, educating on diversity and maintaining an inclusive environment. Features

products.name: Brooks Men's Adrenaline GTS 23 (Moonbeam/Iris/Indigo) Men's Shoes
products.brandedName: Brooks Men's Adrenaline GTS 23 (Moonbeam/Iris/Indigo) Men's Shoes
products.description: The primary materials that compose this product contain a minimum of 20 percent recycled content. ; Give lightweight and ideal solace to your feet without compromising your stylish look with the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 23 sneakers. This sneaker comes with a recycled engineered air mesh upper that provides comfort and breathability with a 3D fit print for added structure, and GuideRails technology adds support by keeping excess movement. This round-toe shoe design comes with brand detailing on the tongue and footbed. Cushion: More; a little bit more for those that like to run or walk on the soft side. (GTS) Go-To-Support helps keep runners in their natural stride, even when they tire. Nylon lining. Removable foam footbed. Lace-up closure. DNA Loft V2 midsole. Heel-to-Toe Drop: 12mm PDAC A5500 Approved: Pricing, Data Analysis and Coding A5500 Diabetic Medicare Coding is awarded to footwear that is available in three or more widths, with a removable insole (sock-liner). These attributes may allow a footwear style to be deemed an extra-depth shoe. It also allows individuals to pay for their footwear through their Medicare. PDAC must be applied for on a yearly basis and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. For more specific info, visit the Medicare website or call 1-800-MEDICARE. APMA Approved: The American Podiatric Medical Association Seal of Acceptance is awarded to products that promote good foot health and are substantiated by a committee of discerning podiatrists by wear-testing and review of the application and supporting documentation. APMA Acceptance must be applied for and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10.8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.name: Logo-Appliquéd Quilted Shell Down Jacket
products.brandedName: Stone Island Logo-Appliquéd Quilted Shell Down Jacket
products.description: Stone Island was founded in 1982 by Massimo Osti, who sought to disrupt the expectations of Italian menswear. Rather than sprezzatura , its collections deliver utility and functionality, as shown by this quilted jacket. It’s made from weather-resistant shell, filled with insulating down and has a signature 'Wind Rose' badge at the sleeve.

products.name: Logo-Appliquéd Recycled-Shell Field Jacket
products.brandedName: Polo Ralph Lauren Logo-Appliquéd Recycled-Shell Field Jacket
products.description: Polo Ralph Lauren's jacket takes cues from classic British field styles. Made from lightweight recycled-shell, it's fitted with four flap pockets and appliquéd with a leather logo patch on the sleeve. The collar can be worn flat or buttoned high to create a shielding funnel neck.

This version is crafted from Cheviot leather with channel-stitched shoulders and a café racer-style collar. It's finished with an off-kilter zipped pocket and the label's signature 'Phoenix' motif on the left sleeve.

Energy return: transforms every heel strike into responsive, explosive forward movement Neutral: provides soft, even cushioning with an emphasis on comfort during any activity Hybrid: transitions from a running shoe to a street sneaker with high-performance comfort for any activity Lace-up style Removable, cushioned insole allows for custom orthotics DNA midsole provides springy cushioning that moves naturally and comfortably with your foot Textile and synthetic upper/synthetic lining/rubber sole Imported

products.name: Locklear Thomas Calle Handmade Huarache Boot In Blue
products.brandedName: Locklear Thomas Calle Handmade Huarache Boot In Blue
products.unbrandedName: Locklear Thomas Calle Handmade Huarache Boot In Blue
products.description: The Calle Boot offers timeless style and adaptability all year round. Handcrafted in limited quantities, these boots are created from ethically sourced, all-natural materials. Designed like huaraches, they are meant to be worn without socks. Meticulously crafted by talented artisans, each pair is unique, ensuring that your new shoes are truly one of a kind. 100% All natural leather Leather is a very durable material, but it’s sensitive to moisture. Therefore, it’s best not to let your Calle Boots come in contact with water. You can use a waterproof spray to protect your boots from water and dust absorbance. If your Calle Boots do get wet, here are some things you can do: 1. Manually wipe off any water with a soft towel or cloth. 2. Stuff the inside of your shoes with newspaper and let your shoes air dry at room temperature. 3. Keep them away from direct sun or heat sources such as hair dryers or fireplace as these can dry out your huaraches. 4. Apply a leather cleaner and conditioner once they are dry. 5. When they are completely dry, you can place cedar shoe trees in your huaraches to keep them from drying out and prevent wrinkling Small scratches can be taken care of with a little polishing, but deep scratches require some more attention.
